    • load

      void load(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Opens an existing charty project. Asks the user to choose a file, deserializes it into a chart, and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage onto which the app is rendered.

    • save

      void save(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Saves current chart into a file. Prompts user for location to save file into and deserializes the current chart into it.
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage onto which the app is rendered.

      Starts charty when invoked
